title: Bela Lugosi | The Devil Bat (1940) Horror, Sci-Fi | Blood Sucking Bats Kill on Command | Colorized

sources.title: Bela Lugosi | The Devil Bat (1940) Horror, Sci-Fi | Blood Sucking Bats Kill on Command | Colorized
sources.description:
Unleash the winged terrors: vengeance has a deadly scent.
Dr. Carruthers, a mad scientist, seeks revenge by training blood-hungry gigantic bats to carry out his deadly vendetta, using a diabolical perfume as a lethal weapon. 

Original title: The Devil Bat (1940)
This film is available with English & Spanish audio, and subtitles in many language options.

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/TbnYqij7igQ


Director: Jean Yarbrough
Writers: John T. Neville, George Bricker
Main Cast:
Bela Lugosi as Dr. Paul Carruthers
Suzanne Kaaren as Mary Heath
Dave O'Brien as Johnny Layton
Guy Usher as Henry Morton
Yolande Donlan as Maxine
Genres: Colorized classics, Cult Film, Horror, Sci-Fi


00:00 - Full colorized movie (with subtitles)
01:30 - A doctor’s glandular experiments yield unexpected success and a surprise bonus.
12:50 - A murder investigation in a small town uncovers bizarre clues and growing suspicions.
19:46 - Investigators unravel a murder mystery in Heathville through suspect interviews and observations.
25:56 - A devil bat terrorizes a small town, sparking fear and urgent investigations.
32:32 - A hoax complicates the murder investigation involving the Heath and Morton families.
37:32 - Mysterious killings linked to a unique shaving lotion lead to shocking revelations.
42:36 - A scientist’s lethal lotion designed to control fate has deadly repercussions.
51:02 - A madman’s diabolical plot using bats to kill families sets off a frantic hunt.
1:02:20 - A scientist unleashes a killer bat to commit murders in a chilling horror film.
